data.title: Michele Lupo, Pluralia Srl: Profile and Biography
data.meta_description: Michele Lupo is Board Member at Pluralia Srl. See Michele Lupo's compensation, career history, education, & memberships.
data.text:
Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world
